inicio.titulo_principal: El mejor tour en La Fortuna de San Carlos e increíble vista del Volcán Arenal
inicio.parrafo_descriptivo: En Sloths Territory podrás observar perezosos de 2 y 3 dedos, además gran variedad de aves y anfibios
intro.titulo_secundario: Sloths Territory in La Fortuna de San Carlos
intro.parrafo_descriptivo: Sloth's Territory is a total trail of 1300 meters, which extends along the natural forest surrounded La Havana River. The trail is accessible for all ages, so this is an activity where the whole family can enjoy it.
intro.testimonial: Visite este paraíso rodeado de naturaleza y habitado por osos perezosos
cards.card_1.parrafo: contamos con un gran hábitad natural
cards.card_2.parrafo: diferentes tipos de plantas y animales, en especial osos perezozos
cards.card_3.parrafo: al Volcán Arenal y a la increíble natuleza que habita en nuestras instalaciones
services.titulo_secundario_parte_1: En Sloths Territory contamos con 3 diferentes actividades
services.titulo_secundario_parte_2: Te invitamos a conocerlas en La Fortuna de San Carlos
service.vista_previa.tour_diurno.parrafo: Ofrecemos varias caminatas diarias iniciando a las: 8 a.m. - 10 a.m. - 1 p.m. y 3 p.m.
service.vista_previa.tour_diurno.item_1: El sendero es accesible para todas las edades
service.vista_previa.tour_diurno.item_2: La duración de esta actividad puede ser de 1 hora y media a 2 horas.
service.vista_previa.tour_nocturno.item_: Nuestra caminata nocturna inicia a las 6:00 p.m.
La duración de esta actividad es de 1 hora y media a 2 horas
service.vista_previa.tour_aves.parrafo: Podrás observar una amplia variedad de especies de: colibríes, tangaras, loros, mieleros, pájaros carpinteros canela, Royal Flycatchers, etc.
service.vista_previa.tour_aves.item_1: El recorrido comienza a las 5:00 a.m.
service.vista_previa.tour_aves.item_2: La duración de esta actividad es de 2 horas
service.tour_diurno.info.parrafo_1: We offer several daily hikes starting at: 8am - 10am - 1pm and 3pm
service.tour_diurno.info.parrafo_2: During the hike, the trail allows you to enjoy a gallery forest with lush vegetation and giant trees as Chilamate and Guácimo Colorado; constituting the habitat of many species like: opossums, two and three toed-sloths and many birds such as toucans, tanagers, Royal Flycatchers and others. But the main attraction is the sloth's observation.
service.tour_diurno.info.parrafo_3: The Rodriguez Family, a traditional Costa Rican family will be your guides, since trying to find sloths require high skills because they use to have an  excellent camouflage that make them imperceptible, for not trained eyes. The trail is accessible for all ages, so this is an activity where the whole family can enjoy it.
service.tour_diurno.info.parrafo_4: El sendero es accesible para todas las edades, por lo que esta es una actividad donde toda la familia puede disfrutarla.
service.tour_diurno.info.parrafo_5: The tour includes a trained guide during the whole hike with professional telescope and fresh seasonal fruits snack at the end.
service.tour_diurno.info.parrafo_6: The duration of this activity can be from 1 and a half to 2 hours and the price is US$28 per person; Children from 6 to 12 y/o US$17 and younger than 5 y/o are free.
service.tour_nocturno.info.parrafo_1: Our night hike starts at 6:00pm, the best time to look for animals with nocturnal behavior.
service.tour_nocturno.info.parrafo_2: During this hike, you will have the chance to see different kind of frogs, kinkajous, snakes, spiders, bats and eventually: two and three-toed sloths (but it is not the focus of this specific hike).
service.tour_nocturno.info.parrafo_3: While the night starts and the sky gets full of stars, our well-trained guide will keep you safe while you continue the hike through our property.
service.tour_nocturno.info.parrafo_4: The trail is accessible for all ages, so this is an activity where the whole family can enjoy it.
service.tour_nocturno.info.parrafo_5: The duration of this activity is 1 and a half to 2 hours. The price is US$45 per person; children from 6 to 12 years US$35.
service.tour_nocturno.info.parrafo_6: The tour includes a trained guide during the whole hike, flashlight and fresh seasonal fruits at the end.
service.tour_aves.info.titulo_secundario: Informacion sobre el tour de aves
service.tour_aves.info.parrafo_1: Thinking about all birdwatching lovers, we have created this exclusive and entertaining activity.
service.tour_aves.info.parrafo_2: The tour starts at 5:00am and one of our professional guides will take you through out beautiful trails to observe a wide variety of species from: Hummingbirds, Tanagers, Parrots, Honeycreepers, Cinnamon Woodpeckers, Royal Flycatchers, Nunbirds.
service.tour_aves.info.parrafo_3: Even when we are focused on the birds, the wide-array of exotic species, in our trails, you will have the opportunity to observe some sloths, frogs and other species.
service.tour_aves.info.parrafo_4: The tour includes a trained guide during the whole hike with professional telescope, binoculars and fresh seasonal fruits snack & coffee, at the end.
service.tour_aves.info.parrafo_5: The duration of this activity is 2 hours.
service.tour_aves.info.parrafo_6: The price is US$45 per person.
details.titulo_principal: Oso perezoso, símbolo nacional de Costa Rica
details.item_1.titulo: El 16 símbolo nacional de Costa Rica
details.item_1.parrafo: El día miercoles 30 de junio del 2021 fue declarado el oso perezoso como símbolo nacional de Costa Rica
details.item_2.parrafo: Las especies Bradypus variegatus (perezoso de 3 dedos) y Choloepus hoffomanni (perezoso de 2 dedos) fueron declarados símbolo nacional de Costa Rica con el fin de destacar la importancia de esta especie en la fauna silvestre de Costa Rica
galeria.titulo_secundario: En esta sección podrás conocer imágenes de las diferentes especies en Sloths Territory
acerca_de.parrafo_descriptivo: Te esperamos, no te pierdas el mejor tour de perezosos de La Fortuna
acerca_de.item_2: Ubicado en El Tanque de La Fortuna de San Carlos.
acerca_de.item_3: Contamos con gran variedad de especies.
contact.titulo_secundario: Sloths Territory La Fortuna de San Carlos
contact.direccion: 4 km de La Fortuna hacia el Este, 400 mts entrada de lastre a la derecha, 200 mts Este Fortuna, Alajuela Provinces, Costa Rica
